sentences.english: When the document is written out you may send it off.
sentences.chinese: 文件繕寫完畢後，可以把它發出去。

sentences.english: He' s busy copying the letters.
He took it back to his desk in the scriptorium and began to read it.
sentences.chinese: 他把它帶回他在繕寫室的書桌並開始閱讀。

sentences.english: The agreement has been made out and initialized.
sentences.chinese: 協議已繕寫完畢並已草簽。
